forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming light freezing rain later at night. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming light freezing rain later at night. Low near 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
